str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To make an image of a calf. From moschos and poieo; to fabricate the image of a bullock.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ana and ago; to lead up; by extension to bring out; specially, to sail away.
Abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering. From thuo; sacrifice.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An idol, false god. From eidos; an image; by implication, a heathen god, or the worship of such.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From eu and phren; to put in a good frame of mind, i.e. Rejoice.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
